Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a remarkable investment. I am offering this exclusive item to you for $100, capturing its true value and providing you with an opportunity to experience its benefits firsthand. I believe this price reflects not only the cost but also the immense value it can bring to you. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
